title: After She Left - Novel Updates
tags: Death of Loved Ones   European Ambience   Male Protagonist   Royalty   Short Story   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 서니
description:
'From now on, I will begin the execution of Empress Kilianerisa Sei Respontia.”

The notorious Empress Kilianerisa died that way.

After her death, the empire was at peace.

No one welcomed her, so it was a better death.

She was a villain according to the public opinion, so her death was justified.

Callisis did not deny it.

It's just that today is just another day in a slightly worse mood than usual.

At least for others.>
